body.text: This action cannot be undone and all its associated data will be lost.
body.send-to-recycle-bin: Send deployment to recycle bin (its storage will still be considered in the user quota until permanently removed).
body.invisible-warning: There are {visible} desktops visible and {invisible} invisible in this deployment. Proceeding will make them all invisible to the users.
body.visible-warning: There are {visible} desktops visible and {invisible} invisible in this deployment. Proceeding will make them all visible to the users.
body.co-owner-warning-delete: Co-owners cannot delete deployments. Please contact the owner to delete this deployment.
body.warning-co-owner: As a co-owner you are not authorized to perform this action. Please contact the owner of this deployment.
body.co-owners-warning: WARNING! Users set as co-owners will have the same permissions as the owner except for changing ownership and deleting the deployment.

option.dont-stop-desktops: Make this deployment invisible to the users and allow the use of the desktops until they're stopped
option.stop-desktops: Make this deployment invisible to the users and stop all the desktops
option.make-visible: Make this deployment visible so the users of the deployment have access to the desktops
option.keep-csv: Keep the current urls and download the csv
option.reset-csv: Reset the deployment urls (old generated urls will not be available) and download the csv

deployment.alloweds-warning: WARNING! Removing users from this deployment will also remove their associated desktops.
